column2: News;According an announcement from the Ministry of Water Resources and Meteorology
column3: a low pressure system will bring heavy rains to some provinces from the 3rd to 9th of September.------Mondulkiri
column6: Stung Treng and Tbong Khmom are predicted to be the hardest affected.------Citizens throughout the country are urged to take care to avoid accidents and be aware of local flooding situations.
